players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I find it strange that Diana was the first one to be killed. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we vote wisely."
Bob: "Diana's death is definitely concerning. I agree we need to be careful with our votes. Does anyone have any insights or suspicions to share?"
Bob: "Alice, you've been very quiet. In a game this small, silence can be telling. What are your thoughts on who might have killed Diana?"
You: "I believe it's important that we all work together to uncover the truth behind Diana's death. Based on my investigation, I have reason to suspect Bob is the mafioso in our midst."
